course.subject: MARK
course.name: Sustainable Marketing
course.description: These days a critical question in companiesâ€™ boardrooms is no longer whether to become a good corporate citizen but how. Corporate social responsibility and sustainability have never been more prominent on corporate agendas than today. Marketing plays a vital role in sustainability. In this course, we explore the meaning of sustainability in a marketing context and how marketing can create value in such endeavors.
